text: Le Mesnil-Bacley is a former commune. It is found in the Normandy region in the Calvados department in the northwest of France. On 1 January 2016, it was merged into the new commune of Livarot-Pays-d'Auge.Arrêté préfectoral 24 December 2015 == References == Category:Former communes in Calvados
title: Le Mesnil-Bacley
